Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, west of Lawrence's Sporting Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Lawrence LeMaande runs a rather large sporting goods shop, where you can purchase a number of useful items for whatever sport you enjoy, from light shoes for long distance walking to mountain climbing equipment for those who enjoy the adrenaline rush of possibly falling hundreds of feet to an unyielding rock floor.
